translations: 欺骗，诱骗；（使）麻醉；（在酒里）下药

sentences.sentence: I'm too exhausted for any hocus-pocus right now! I want my daughter home!
sentences.translation: 我现在太精疲力尽了！ 我要我女儿回家！

sentences.sentence: The page should initially look like Figure 1; click Hocus Pocus!
sentences.translation: 页面初看起来应该和 图 1 相同，但是点击 Hocus Pocus!

sentences.sentence: You can listen to more music, but you shouldn't hocus yourself in it;
sentences.translation: 你可以多听音乐，但却不能让音乐麻醉自己；
